solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int integerBreak(int n) {--newline--        if(n==2) return 1;--newline--        if(n==3) return 2;--newline--        int product = 1;--newline--        while(n>4){--newline--            product*=3;--newline--            n-=3;--newline--        }--newline--        product*=n;--newline--        --newline--        return product;--newline--    }--newline--}
